comment.body:
@Alex-302 中国地区 微信 APP与谷歌商城wechat APP是隔离的，并且应该是限制+86号码进行注册，所以你这边无法完成注册应该是正常的。

我之前也有尝试解决这个广告，但是也只能做到和报告中的效果一样，拦截掉广告图片，但是广告本身的占位无法拦截，通过与其他人的交流得知，需要把adguard的证书移动到系统证书才能解决这个问题，但是移动证书需要root权限，所以我放弃了。

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://consumer.huawei.com/content/dam/huawei-cbg-site/cn/mkt/mobileservices/browser/exe/HuaweiBrowser-12.1.4.300-signed.exe

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

_No response_

AdGuard Annoyances filter

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

上面的下载链接是华为浏览器PC版，为了方便只能使用PC版的链接，没办法给你手机安卓版。我使用华为浏览器且使用百度搜索引擎，然后无法搜索。问题就在于legitimate URL过滤器，你们看一下第二张图。但我关闭这个过滤器后就能搜索了。第三张图就是搜索结果。

issue.title: The legitimate URL filter causes HUAWEI Browser to fail to search when using Baidu Search

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://consumer.huawei.com/content/dam/huawei-cbg-site/cn/mkt/mobileservices/browser/exe/HuaweiBrowser-12.1.4.300-signed.exe

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

上面的下载链接是华为浏览器PC版，为了方便只能使用PC版的链接，没办法给你手机安卓版。我使用华为浏览器且使用百度搜索引擎，然后无法搜索。问题就在于legitimate URL过滤器，你们看一下第二张图。但我关闭这个过滤器后就能搜索了。第三张图就是搜索结果。

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ea3bd4ff-b7d0-4a0d-aba4-6e00bd4200db)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7217c81c-0cb8-47e2-a9f6-54bce65381de)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2a308b70-46af-4dcf-a507-12ba69de36e3)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> 请检查。

我将那个过滤器禁止后就能正常搜索，这种情况我一直能够复现。是否可以移除那条规则？
